name: DCP Setup Maker
body:
### DCP Setup Maker.
Powerful simple-to-use application to generate stable and multi-platform installers.  
See how the DCP Setup Maker installer was made in only 2 minutes:
<https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lb4nBb8wUqE>

Its intuitive user interface and exceptional ease of use makes it very easy to build complex desktop or web installers with large amounts of files. The whole process is done step by step through a wizard-like interface, filling in fields and setting up files to finally build your package without any required knowledge. 

To start the program, launch it by double-clicking on it or run a command like this:
```
$ java -jar path/to/DCP.jar
```

### Authors and Contributors
In Mars 2013, Said SAID EL IMAM (@jackred) founded the devcompack project with DCP Setup Maker. The project source-code was then moved to Github on January 2015.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with DCP Setup Maker? Check out the documentation at http://devcompack.sourceforge.net/tutorial, post a question on the forum at http://devcompack.sourceforge.net/forum or contact jackred@users.sourceforge.net and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
